headline: Better Energy Stock: Vitesse Energy vs. Devon Energy
summary: The two oil companies make for a fascinating comparison.  High-yielding Vitesse Energy (NYSE: VTS) and Devon Energy (NYSE: DVN) are connected in that Vitesse has minority interests in Devon-operated wells in the Williston Basin of North Dakota and Montana (Bakken Formation).

headline: 4 Discounted PEG Stocks Offering the Best Returns to Value Investors

headline: Very Bad News For Energy Stocks
summary: Energy stocks are in decline, with the sell-off potentially continuing. Learn which high-yield energy stocks could be great buying opportunities right now.
